title: [Windows, .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 6] In release configuration only, SKGLView on Windows flashes in white for c. first 200ms or so when made visible using NVDIA GPU
body:
### Description

In release configuration on Windows using .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 6, SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 3.1, and NVDIA GPU, SKGLView is white or flashes in white for c. 200 ms when made visible. With integrated GPU (Intel UHD Graphics), SKGLView does not flash white but works properly. Both debug configuration with NVIDIA and integrated GPU in release mode work fine.

### Code

https://github.com/hyvanmielenpelit/GnollHack

However, we already made a workaround by adding a black frame on the top of the flashing SKGLView for the first 250ms.

### Expected Behavior

SKGLView does not flash in white under any circumstances.

### Actual Behavior

SKGLView flashes in white for the first 200ms after being made visible when using .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 6, SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 3.1, release configuration, Windows platform, and NVDIA GPU.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.x (Alpha)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

Other (Please indicate in the description)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System
